java/liquibase/change/DropViewChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.DropViewStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.View;
00008 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00009 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00011 
00012 import java.util.Arrays;
00013 import java.util.HashSet;
00014 import java.util.Set;
00015 
00019 public class DropViewChange extends AbstractChange {
00020     private String schemaName;
00021     private String viewName;
00022 
00023     public DropViewChange() {
00024         super("dropView", "Drop View");
00025     }
00026 
00027     public String getSchemaName() {
00028         return schemaName;
00029     }
00030 
00031     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00032         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00033     }
00034 
00035     public String getViewName() {
00036         return viewName;
00037     }
00038 
00039     public void setViewName(String viewName) {
00040         this.viewName = viewName;
00041     }
00042 
00043     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00044         return new SqlStatement[]{
00045                 new DropViewStatement(getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getViewName()),
00046         };
00047     }
00048 
00049     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00050         return "View "+getViewName()+" dropped";
00051     }
00052 
00053     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00054         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("dropView");
00055         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00056             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00057         }
00058         element.setAttribute("viewName", getViewName());
00059 
00060         return element;
00061     }
00062 
00063     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00064         View dbObject = new View();
00065         dbObject.setName(viewName);
00066 
00067         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(dbObject));
00068     }
00069 
00070 }
